content.title: Different Views of Volt MX Iris
content.body:
Once the application is imported successfully, you can explore the different forms in the application.

The application first opens in the Storyboard view. You can view the different forms inside the app and their connections in this view.

To view the Properties of each widget in a form, double click on any form to go to the Design View. You can also select the Design tab to navigate to the Design view.
